name: Dôkutsu tanken
description:
Dôkutsu tanken is a puzzle / stealth game  about a girl exploring a cave in her search for the hidden gold.

Objective:

Pick the key to open the lock and continue to the next level. Experiment, survive, collect coins to beat your score an have fun!

Controls:

Arrows: Move / Throw jar

Z: Accept / Wait / Dive

F1: Toogle full screen
